item.title: ASUS 1015E-DS03
item.description: The ASUS 1015E-DS03 is a low-cost 10.1 inch netbook that's less than 1 inch thin and just weighs 2.64lbs.

item.title: How to Install Ubuntu on a Acer C710 Chromebooks Running Coreboot
item.description: In this tutorial YouTuber Johnny Phung shows how to install Ubuntu Linux on an Acer C710 Chromebook with Coreboot flashed on it.

item.title: ASUS VivoBook X202E with Ubuntu 12.10: Touchscreen Demo
item.description: This is a quick demo video of the touchscreen capabilities of Ubuntu 12.10 on an ASUS VivoBook X202E. When the video was created in late 2012, that was the newest version of Ubuntu.

item.title: ASUS X201E-DH01
item.description: The ASUS X201E-DH01 is a 11.6-inch laptop powered by an 1.1 GHz dual-core Intel Celeron 847 CPU and is equipped with 4GB DDR3 RAM

item.title: ASUS VivoBook X200CA-DB02
item.description: The ASUS VivoBook X200CA-DB02 is a 11.6-inch laptop powered by an 1.5 GHz dual-core Intel Celeron 1007U CPU running Ubuntu 12.04 LTS.

item.title: Migrate an old Hacktop from Windows XP to Ubuntu
item.description: These videos from the Computerphile channel show how to migrate an 8yr old Hacktop from Windows XP to Ubuntu 2012 LTS.

item.title: How to Run Linux on Chromebooks with Crouton
item.description: In this video tutorial YouTuber Johnny Phung shows how you can run other Linuxes than Chrome OS on Chromebooks using a software called crouton.

item.title: Run Chrome OS and Linux simultaneously on the Chromebook Pixel
item.description: In this demo video Kevin Tofel of Gigaom shows how you can use Google's Chromebook Pixel with other Linux based operating systems than Chrome OS.

item.title: ASUS 1015E-DS02
item.description: The ASUS 1015E-DS02 is a low-cost 10.1 inch netbook that's less than 1 inch thin and just weighs 2.64lbs.

item.title: ASUS F201E
item.description: The ASUS F201E is a low-cost 11.6 inch laptop powered by a 1.1 GHz Intel Celeron 847 processor.
